snippet: With crude oil prices hitting five-year lows, investors are scrambling to gauge the impact of the sharp drop in petroleum costs on companies beyond the energy sector....

headline.print_headline: Assessing the Fallout From the Fall in Oil Prices
headline.main: Assessing the Fallout From the Fall in Oil Prices

lead_paragraph: With crude oil prices hitting five-year lows, investors are scrambling to gauge the impact of the sharp drop in petroleum costs on companies beyond the energy sector.
